thread.title: Soap | Fair City - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Soap | Fair City - entertainment.ie
text: Bob and Heather continue to clash as Bob feels that Heather is playing Renee to do things for her. He's not wrong there. Later on then, Bob hears from Ellie that she misses her dad and suggests to Heather that they should give him a call. However, Heather is not happy with Bob's interference and tells him not to bring Brendan up in front of Ellie again. Hmm what is that about? Elsewhere, the whole Sash/Nina/Laura love triangle debacle continues, with Sash wanting Nina back, while Nina is more eager for Laura to forgive her... it's very messy altogether. Also today, Dan tries to convince Carol that he feels nothing for Sally, but sure we all know that's not true.
